title: Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve: NPS Centennial
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     NPS Centennial            NPS Centennial       The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks. Find Your Park Experiences offer unique opportunities to explore national parks both in person and online. Check out the experiences in this park or search all experiences to identify an opportunity that matches your interests. You can also share your national park story at FindYourPark.com. A Call to Action remains the foundation for our 2016 centennial preparations. It is the National Park Service's blueprint for the future, outlining the innovative work we want to accomplish. Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve is a big part of this effort. Take a look at what we're doing and get involved!   Experiences      Enjoy Solitude and Wide Open Space  Do you need time to relax, get away from hectic schedules and deadlines, and recharge your spirit? Come to Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve and experience over 40 miles of hiking trails, endless skies, and quiet. There are places on the preserve where you see only nature; nothing human made. Places where you only hear the wind rustling the grass and the grasshoppers sing. Bring a picnic, find a nice spot, and enjoy some time to yourself as nature helps rejuvenate the soul.
